mapper.sql: role_id, code, name, description, sort, version, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.role_id,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t1.description,GROUP_CONCAT(t3.`code`) menuCodes,GROUP_CONCAT(t3.`name`) menuNames,t1.sort,t1.create_time FROM sys_role t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t2.role_code = t1.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_menu t3 ON t3.`code` = t2.menu_code
and t1.name like CONCAT(#{qo.name}, '%') or t1.code like CONCAT(#{qo.name}, '%')
GROUP BY t1.`code` ORDER BY t1.role_id

SELECT t1.role_id,t1.`code`,t1.`name`,t1.description,GROUP_CONCAT(t3.`code`) menuCodes,GROUP_CONCAT(t3.`name`) menuNames,t1.sort,t1.create_time FROM sys_role t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t2.role_code = t1.`code` LEFT JOIN sys_menu t3 ON t3.`code` = t2.menu_code where t1.code = #{code} GROUP BY t2.role_code
